---
labels: ['module']
description: 'Webpack bundler'
---

API:

Generate an instance of the Webpack bundler.

```ts
WebpackBundler.from(options: WebpackBundlerOptions): EnvHandler<WebpackBundler>
```

Generate an instance of the Webpack bundler when you already have the aspects.
```ts
WebpackBundler create(
  options: WebpackBundlerOptions,
  aspectContext: WebpackBundlerAspectsContext
): WebpackBundler
```
